summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3798 for the improvement of Beach Drive, as established by condemnation, from the south line of Seashore Park 2nd Addition, to West Juneau Street, by grading and curbing and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46813, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
